abstract: The Bank of America, which expects to complete its $3.3 billion purchase of Charles Schwab‘s U.S. Trust private banking arm this fall. said Thursday that its private banking chief, Jane Magpiong, plans to leave the company.
lead_paragraph: The Bank of America, which expects to complete its $3.3 billion purchase of Charles Schwab‘s U.S. Trust private banking arm this fall. said Thursday that its private banking chief, Jane Magpiong, plans to leave the company.

headline.main: Bank of America’s Private Banking Chief to Step Down
